com.mpos.lottery.te.valueaddservice.airtime.service

类 MultiProviderAirtimeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.valueaddservice.airtime.service.MultiProviderAirtimeService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AirtimeService

    public class MultiProviderAirtimeService
extends java.lang.Object
implements AirtimeService
    This implementation will support multiple airtime service providers. Client should call topup(Context, AirtimeTopup) to topup mobile balance, this implementation will route cient's request to appropriate service provider (airtime telecomm).

    • 方法详细资料

      • topup

        public AirtimeTopup topup(Context respCtx,
                 AirtimeTopup topupReq)
                   throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: AirtimeService
        Topup the balance of mobile phone by airtime. There will be multiple different airtime provider, this service will route the request to appropriate airtime provider.

        When call remote airtime interface, this service(the client of remote service) may get read timeout, in this case, this service will create a persisted quartz job which will keep calling airtime interface(transaction enquiry) to get a definite result. Once got result, this job will update locak airtime topup records, and update response code of transaction accordingly(200 for success, 502 for failure, 501 for pending).

        JDBC Transaction In generate TE will rollback transaction if ApplicationException or RuntimeException thrown out, however there is a special case that, when got read timeout or 3rd parth service, TE has to commit the transaction for quartz job to update later.

        Pre-Condition

        • THe amount must meed the game parameters.
        • Operator got enough sale balance

        Post-Condition

        If got success response from airtime service provider,

        • Generate airtime topup transaction if successful or pending.
        • Generate balance transaction records following the sale style.
        • Deduct the sale balance.
        • Publish AMQP message of airtime transaction.

        Usage Restriction

        • Authorization - Can only be called by authorized GPEs.
        • Concurrent Access - To a single device, this interface must be called sequentially. To multiple devices, there are no limitation on the number of concurrent accesses.
        指定者:
        topup 在接口中 AirtimeService
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        topupReq - The request DTO of client, the following components must be set: mobileNo, amount, game.Id
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any business exception.

      • jobTopup

        public void jobTopup(org.quartz.JobExecutionContext jobContext,
            java.lang.String transactionId,
            AirtimeTopup result)
              throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: AirtimeService
        The job service for updating previous pending airtime transaction. The service will be called by quartz job which will be created if AirtimeService.topup(Context, AirtimeTopup) response 501(remote service timeout).

        Pre-Condition

        • The transaction must be pending status.
        Post-Condition
        • Update transaction response code to 200(airtime service provider response success) or 502(airtime service provider response failure).
        • Update the status of airtime topup transaction response code to success(airtime service provider response success) or failure(airtime service provider response failure).
          • *
        • And if airtime service provider response success:
          • Deduct sale balance.
          • Generate balance transaction records
          • Publish AMQP message of airtime transaction.
        指定者:
        jobTopup 在接口中 AirtimeService
        参数:
        jobContext - the context of quartz job.
        transactionId - The id of pending transaction.
        result - The result responded by remote service.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any business related exception.

        protected void verifyBalance(Context respCtx,
